comments.author: standsongrace@gmail.com
comments.creator: standsongrace@gmail.com
comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0
Build Identifier: 

There should be UI for editing the custom dictionary (persdict.dat) This would require allowing it to be edited without closing the browser. It would have functionality to import words from other custom dictionaries (and ultimately be incorporated with Sync).

Reproducible: Always
comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0
Build Identifier: 

There should be UI for editing the custom dictionary (persdict.dat) This would require allowing it to be edited without closing the browser. It would have functionality to import words from other custom dictionaries (and ultimately be incorporated with Sync).

Reproducible: Always
